content: simple worsted-weight toque with a little festive brim colourwork motif co 90 sts in main colour and join the in round yarn dawn orchid bfl worsted 100% british bfl wool 182 work k1 p1 ribbing for 6 yds per 100g 1 skein each in balsam grove & k two rounds winter sun filcolana paia 67% viscose 33% polyester 268yds per colourwork 25g 1 ball of 712 emerald shimmer lang paillettes 55% nylon 45% polyester 122yds per join contrast colour and follow the colourwork chart 25g 1 ball of 02 crystal reading from right to left bottom to top and repeating nine times per round the paia is held double with the green dawn orchid throughout main colour the paillettes is held double with the white dawn orchid contrast colour gauge different gauges are used to adjust the sizing adult l 18sts per 4 adult s 20 sts per 4 needles dpns or magic loop adult l 4 5mm adult s 4 0mm you may wish to go up a needle size during the colourwork section to maintain gauge other tools darning needle © 2025 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca k another 10 rounds top round 1 k8 k2tog around abbreviations rounds 2 4 6 8 10 k k knit p purl round 3 k7 k2tog around k2tog knit 2 together round 5 k6 k2tog around co cast on st s stitch es round 7 k5 k2tog around round 9 k4 k2tog around round 11 k3 k2tog around round 12 k2 k2tog around round 13 k1 k2tog around round 114 k2tog around 9sts break yarn and draw through remaining sts and pull tight weave in all ends © 2025 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
